com.aurel.track.persist

Class TWorkItemPeer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.torque.util.BasePeer
      • com.aurel.track.persist.BaseTWorkItemPeer
        • com.aurel.track.persist.TWorkItemPeer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkItemDAO, java.io.Serializable

    public class TWorkItemPeer
extends BaseTWorkItemPeer
implements WorkItemDAO
    This class is the persistence layer proxy for the core objects in the Genji system, the issues.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • save

        public java.lang.Integer save(TWorkItemBean workItemBean)
                       throws ItemPersisterException
        Saves a workItemBean in the TWorkItem table and creates/updates a lucene Document for it. Be sure that the TWorkItem.save() is not called directly from other program code, because then no lucene indexing takes place!!!
